item.title: Auto-Talker 4.00
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Ok, i made my other talker into srl with anti randoms XD. Didn’t see any reason to add multiple people lol so here it is.
[scar]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Auto-Talker

Author = Hey321

Description = Auto-Talks for ya for specified times

Version = 6.0

Date = Thursday, November, 9TH, 3: 30: 41 PM

Comments = Good script

/Script Info}
program MessageWriter;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
Message1=(‘Buying 100 lobs 300 ea. x i v x.’);
WaitTime=1000;
NumLoops=100;

var
MessagesTyped: Integer;

procedure login;
begin
NumberOfPlayers(1);
Players[0].name := (‘t3h0n30wn4g3’);
Players[0].pass := (‘heyhey’);

if(not loggedin)then
loginplayer
end;

Procedure DoRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

procedure MessageSender;
begin
ActivateClient;
TypeSend(Message1+chr(13));
Sleep(1)
MessagesTyped:=MessagesTyped+1;
end;

procedure TimeToWait;
begin
wait (waittime + random (250));
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\—[]’);
Writeln(’ Thanks for using Hey321s’);
Writeln(’ Auto-Talker ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked for:’ +ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(’ Sentences typed: ‘+IntToStr(MessagesTyped)+’’);
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\—[]’);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
SetupSRL;
login
repeat
MessageSender;
DoRandoms;
TimeToWait;
DoRandoms;
ProgressReport;
until(MessagesTyped = NumLoops);
wait(WaitTime + random (50));
DoRandoms;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
